table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT:
set nocount on declare @pageList nvarchar(max) set @pageList = '' select @pageList = @pageList + ';' + convert(nvarchar(10), PagePost_PageID) from wcms_PagePost where PagePost_PostID = @editID if (@pageList <> '') set @pageList = substring(@pageList, 2, len(@pageList) - 1)
select [Post_ID] ,[Post_Title] ,[Post_O] ,[Post_A] ,[Post_ImageLink] ,[Post_Brief] ,[Post_Description] ,[Post_Date] ,[Post_PostedBy] ,[Post_MetaTitle] ,[Post_MetaKeywords] ,[Post_MetaDescription] ,[Post_Authors] ,@pageList as [PostPageList] ,'' as [Post_TitleUrl] ,'' as [Post_FullText] from WCMS_Post where Post_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: Update WCMS_Post set [Post_A] = @active where Post_ID = @editID Select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE:
set nocount on declare @id int set @id = @delID
Delete wcms_PostKeyword where PostKeyword_PostID = @id Delete wcms_PagePost where PagePost_PostID = @id Delete wcms_Comment where Comment_ItemID = @id set nocount off
Delete WCMS_Post where Post_ID = @id Select @@ROWCOUNT
